messages.message:
Hi all, I’m trying to read a file from my apps on apps-server and I’m getting this:

```ERROR - [File_service_v2 Enabled] - Readfile RPC stream error: <_Rendezvous of RPC that terminated with:
	status = StatusCode.UNIMPLEMENTED
	details = "unknown method ReadFileStream for service file_service.FileService"
	debug_error_string = "{"created":"@1634674321.647479000","description":"Error received from peer ipv4:127.0.0.1:9600","file":"src/core/lib/surface/call.cc","file_line":1052,"grpc_message":"unknown method ReadFileStream for service file_service.FileService","grpc_status":12}"```
This code was working a few weeks ago but I’m just taking another look at it now and it seems it can’t read the file on the filesystem anymore. Any ideas?
I disabled file service v2 and all is well

@John St This could be a compilation issue as far as I can tell. Last week we merge a change that explicitly call the stream-based grpc call ReadFileStream/WriteFileStream. Are you running this in your local env? You may want to try recompiling the grpc-file-service and see if the error disappeared.
I am running this in my local. I'll take a look at building the grpc-file-service. Should make build runlocal work for that?
Yes I'd expect that to work. Let me know if you still encounter issues.
